title: Bug 6304: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file with another resource, the synchronization process fails.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the project containing a .java file and another resource.
2. Right-click on the .java file and select the option to synchronize.
3. Note that the synchronization process does not complete successfully.
